hackathon-description-text: We're very excited to finally host the first hackathon in HackTrack's global hackathon series!

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Judges will be announced in the event.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 5000 ILS + Merkspace Hot Desk for a month
2500 ILS + Merkspace Hot Desk for a month
JetBrains License for each member + Merkspace Hot Desk for a month
The winning team in Misfit's Challenge will get Misfit Flash + Misfit Bolt for each member.
The winning team in OnePlus's Social Challenge will get OnePlus X for each member.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
Difficulty: Does the application demonstrate technical competence/knowledge?
Variety of Tech: Did the team use a variety of technologies?
Bugs: Did the project execute cleanly?
Extensibility and Functionality: Is the "hack extensible"?

Originality: Is the idea original? Has it never been done before?
Implementation and Development: Is the hack novel in its implementation or development?
User Needs: Does the hack identify and fulfill the user’s need?
Pitch: Were the presenters clear, and did they communicate their idea effectively?

User Interface: Is the application aesthetically pleasing?
User Experience: Is the application intuitive to use?
Overall Rank: On a scale of 1 to 10, what is the overall rank of the application?
Uses RapidAPI: Is the application based on RapidAPI? If so, how much of the application is based on RapidAPI?

hackathon-description-header: HackTrack is a hackathon competition where the most talented teenagers come together to create and invent new technologies, apps, and other products.
hackathon-location-description: Wix offices in the Tel Aviv Port (Hangar 26 & 27)
